title: 107_hr5627
content: Family Dairy Farmer and Rural Community Rescue Act of 2002 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out counter-cyclical income support programs for dairy producers in participating and nonparticipating States through 2011. Limits individual or entity payments to 230,000 pounds of milk per month. Provides with respect to the participating State program for: (1) specified marketing area target prices, (2) five regional supply management districts, (3) specified payment rates. And (4) establishment in the Treasury of a National Dairy Producers Trust Fund.
